newest.message:
# Release v4.0.16
## Bug Fixes - Assets ESI endpoint updated - Expired or completed market orders will be visible in most cases in the notification window - Reactions count calculates using the correct skill - Hotmail SMTP server updated for skill completed notifications
## Contributors - Peter Han - jamesemullican - poundjd - Wodin73 - hollo6

release.message:
# Release v4.0.17
## Bug Fixes - Fully rewrite image handler to fix missing images and invalid character identities in multiple locations - Replace corrupted SDE files from CCP with last known good version which resolves a variety of missing data issues
## Contributors - Peter Han - wvdvegt - hollo6 - landrace
